name: Fruits Forest: Rainbow Apple
description:
Move the [FRUIT] to match the same color.
Clear your mission by matching three or more [FRUITS] !
Experience the variant stages and effects of unique fruits!

[Features]
- brain puzzle game with simple rule
- no play limit such as heart, play as much as you can!
- can play even without network!
- game file is as low as 20M, light-weight download!
- supports tablet screen
- supports 14 languages
